Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form

Hi. I am using newsbreak api token and try to integrate newsbreak apis into my website. Now on creating ads with api end point: https://business.newsbreak.com/business-api/v1/ad/create

I am continuously getting this error:
"There is an issue with the ad platform that we are currently addressing. Please stay tuned for updates, and feel free to reach out to your Account Manager for more information. Thank you!"

Though my ads are being created. Please fix this issue

Hi there! It sounds like you're encountering a known issue with the NewsBreak API. While your ads are being created, the error message indicates that there might be a temporary issue on the platform's side. Unfortunately, I can't directly fix this issue for you, but I recommend reaching out to our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance. They can provide more detailed information and updates regarding this error. In the meantime, you can continue using the API as your ads are still being created successfully.
